solution_line_template: If Terrence earns {terrence_earnings} dollars, then Jermaine earns ${terrence_earnings} + ${jermaine_extra} = $<<{terrence_earnings}+{jermaine_extra}={jermaine_earnings}>>{jermaine_earnings} dollars.
The total earnings of the two are ${terrence_earnings} + ${jermaine_earnings} = $<<{terrence_earnings}+{jermaine_earnings}={total_jermaine_terrence}>>{total_jermaine_terrence} dollars.
